ValidationRule.description: If one field on the Upside section is filled, you need to fill all the UpSide fields and You do not need to fill Risk Details. (Req:561)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISBLANK( Upside_Action_plan__c ), ISBLANK( Upside_Deadline__c ) , ISBLANK( Upside_Owner__c ) , ISBLANK( Upside_Project_description_major_reason__c) , ISPICKVAL (Upside_Rating__c,'' ) , ISBLANK(Upside_Support_required__c) ), NOT( AND( ISBLANK( Upside_Action_plan__c ), ISBLANK( Upside_Owner__c ) , ISBLANK( Upside_Deadline__c ) , ISBLANK( Upside_Project_description_major_reason__c) , ISPICKVAL (Upside_Rating__c,'' ) , ISBLANK(Upside_Support_required__c) ) ), ($Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Fill All The Upside Details
